scripts.reset: php vendor/bin/phinx rollback -t 0 && php vendor/bin/phinx migrate && php vendor/bin/phinx seed:run
scripts.watch:sass: node-sass-chokidar sass/ -o public/css/ --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/ -w sass/* -r
scripts.postcss: postcss css/app.css --use postcss-import --use postcss-font-magician --use autoprefixer --use css-mqpacker --use cssnano --output public/css/app.css --no-map
scripts.watch:postcss: postcss css/app.css --use postcss-import --use postcss-font-magician --use autoprefixer --use css-mqpacker --use cssnano --output public/css/app.css --no-map --watch
scripts.start: yarn sass && yarn postcss && yarn sync & yarn watch:postcss & webpack --watch & yarn watch:sass
